name: We Pick Up Trash Together
description:
Keep the beach clean and safe!

- Your highly-skilled team of Kerbs have dedicated their lives to clearing the beach of trash, keeping the environment safe and healthy for everyone! 

Expand your team!

- A mysterious donor rewards you with money for every piece of trash cleared.

- Use the money to build a diverse and efficient team by ordering new Kerbs. 

- Select a Kerb from the shop at the bottom-right! Click within the green area to spawn!  

Keep your Kerbs safe!

- The Volunteer Protection Act of 2042 requires at least one of your Kerbs to be alive. Otherwise, your operation will be shut down!

- Use the loudspeaker to recall your Kerbs in the event of an emergency! Your team of Kerbs are experienced professionals who are trained to respond swiftly in high pressure situations. I am sure you will be fine.

- P.S. DON'T SPAWN BUM !!!!!
